ne: <p style="text-align:center"><img alt="" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgtstha/NEPAL-QUEST-DATA/main/images/nepal_map_blue.png" /></p><p style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:14px">नेपालको संविधानको भाग-५, धारा ५६ बमोजिम राज्यको संरचनाको व्यवस्था गरिएको छ|</span></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">संघीय लोकतान्त्रिक गणतन्त्र नेपालको मूल संरचना संघ, प्रदेश र स्थानीय तह गरी तीन तहको हुने ।</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">नेपालको राज्यशक्तिको प्रयोग संघ, प्रदेश र स्थानीय तहले यस संविधान तथा कानून बमोजिम गर्ने ।</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">यो संविधान बमोजिम ७ प्रदेश रहने ।</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">स्थानीय तह अन्तर्गत गाउँपालिका, नगरपालिका र जिल्ला सभा रहने ।</span></p></li></ul><p style="text-align:center"><strong><span style="font-size:18px">संघीय व्यवस्था सञ्चालन पद्दति</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p><p style="text-align:center"><img alt="" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgtstha/NEPAL-QUEST-DATA/main/images/federal_structure_nepali.png" /></p>
en: <p style="text-align:center"><img alt="" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgtstha/NEPAL-QUEST-DATA/main/images/nepal_map_blue.png" /></p><p style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:14px">According to schedules -5, Article 56 of the Constitution of Nepal, the structure of the country is arranged</span></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">The basic structure of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal will be three-layerd, namely the federal, provincial and local levels.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">The state power of Nepal shall be exercised by the federal, provincial and local levels in accordance with this constitution and laws.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">According to this constitution, there will be 7 provinces.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="font-size:14px">Under the local level, there will be rural-municipalities, municipalities and district assemblies.</span></p></li></ul><p style="text-align:center"><strong><span style="font-size:18px">Federal System Operating Procedures</span></strong></p><p style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p><p style="text-align:center"><img alt="" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgtstha/NEPAL-QUEST-DATA/main/images/federal_structure_english.png" /></p>
